title: Lucida Sans working strangely in OS X
content:
Hi guys,

I am using Suitcase Fusion but this font is activated in Font Book as it is a default system font.

Most places it works, just not in mail and safari this time.

comments.content:
It obviously gets somehow confused with Zapf Dingbats.

You could try a different text encoding method, that might help. Also, would it be possible to turn off or temporarely remove Dingbats to see if it makes any difference?

I had problems with Arial sometimes with Suitcase, and turning fonts on and off and testing to see which combination works helped.
